sampleElementId1.label: Recurse
sampleElementId1.title: Recurse Subdirectories
sampleElementId1.description: If checked, this option will search for images in subdirectories of the selected directory.

sampleElementId2.label: Auto-Save
sampleElementId2.title: Auto-Save Captions
sampleElementId2.description: If checked, this option will automatically save any captions applied to the images.
